house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1995 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Excalibur Realty RE/MAX Excalibur Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Great Room,Microwave, Pantry
